about_the_game:
Two animals, Cherry Bear and Blink Fox, that lived in the green grassland have long dreamed of traveling around the world, but their traveling hot air balloon is stolen by unknown forces. In order to find back the hot air balloon and continue their traveling dreams, they set foot on the adventure for chasing hot air balloons. After crossing tropical island, harvest maple leaf farm and cold snow canyon, the hot air balloon was finally discovered. However, greater and unknown challenges were lying ahead.

Art and Music

  • Characters and scenes as well as props and UI are all hand-painted with concise lines, and the painting style is cute and warm
  • Interesting level scenes are all full of immersive music and beautiful cartoon scenery

Gameplay Control

  • The game is easy to play and requires flexible skills, flying, dodging, picking up items, throwing, but also should consider inertia and rebound, remember to stay away from unkown animals
  • Support a variety of control types includeing keyboard, gamepad, touch screen(only on mobile device), there is always a suitable control type for you

Multiple Modes

  • Story mode, you can follow the journey of the small animal characters, finally meet the exciting Boss battle
  • Endless Mode, you can try if you can survive long enough against the environment, break the ranking record

Cooperation

  • Support local single game or 1-4 players cooperated game, players can help each other or tease each other
  • Support LAN online 1-4 players cooperated game, cross screen interaction just brings a lot of fun

About Developer

The game develop team Draw Flipped Studio is made up of two amateur game enthusiasts, our major careers are from other unrelated industries. Because we like playing games and are fond of digital art, we want to do some staff for relax and realize our dream after work, so we created this simple indie game little by little based on the joyful memories of childhood game. Hope this little funny game can bring pure happiness for everyone.

short_description: A cute art style, 2D scroll casual action adventure game, you need to play animals flying in the air on a balloon, fight and trample the balloons of others to win. You will see diverse natural scenery, face unknown challenges, start a joyous adventure, bring back the balloon fight fun of childhood.
